org.gearvrf.scene_objects.view

Class GVRTextView

  • java.lang.Object
    • TextView
      • org.gearvrf.scene_objects.view.GVRTextView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GVRView
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class GVRTextView
extends TextView
implements GVRView
    This class represents a TextView that is rendered into the attached GVRViewSceneObject. Internally this view is added to a LinearLayout. See GVRView and GVRViewSceneObject

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GVRTextView(GVRActivity context)
      Deprecated. 
       
      GVRTextView(GVRActivity context, int viewWidth, int viewHeight)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates a new instance and sets its internal Layout container with the specified width and height.
      GVRTextView(GVRActivity context, int viewWidth, int viewHeight, java.lang.String text)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates a new instance and sets its internal Layout container with the specified width and height, and text with specified text.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      View getView()
      Deprecated. 
      GVRViewSceneObject will call it to get the view.
      void setSceneObject(GVRViewSceneObject sceneObject)
      Deprecated. 
      The scene object created to this view will call GVRView.setSceneObject(GVRViewSceneObject) to set itself to the view.

                   int viewWidth,
                   int viewHeight,
                   java.lang.String text)

        viewHeight - Height of the Layout container
        text - Text to set to the text view.
